item.description:
Dance For A Cure Gala

Prostate Cancer Benefit

1/2 Price Tix

Featuring Dancing with the Stars Celebs!

Join your favorite celebrities from ABC's hit dance competition series Dancing With the Stars for a fun evening of dancing, cocktails, performances, auctions and a celebrity-led dance workshop. Presented by AdMeTech Foundation in partnership with Arthur Murray International, Dance for a Cure is a lively fundraising gala benefitting research and education programs dedicated to advancing the early detection and treatment of prostate cancer. Festivities include dance performances by Dancing With the Stars celebs Jonathan Roberts and Anna Trebunskaya, a special musical performance by Mark Ballas, and more.Nick Kosovich, Emmy-nominated Dancing With the Stars choreographer, and WCVB anchor Susan Wornick host the show. Auction items include two VIP tickets to the 2013 Dancing With the Stars finale, a football signed by New England Patriot Tom Brady and more

 

Celebrities from Dancing With the Stars are coming to Boston to Dance for a Cure of Prostate Cancer. Join Mark Ballas, Nick Kosovich, Jonathan Roberts and Anna Trebunskaya for a fun night of dancing, cocktails, performances, auctions and even a celebrity-led dance workshop!

 

1/2 Price Tix!

All members are responsible for purchasing their own tickets.  Use this link to get 1/2 price tixfor $25!  Regular price is $50!

http://www.goldstar.com/groups/c478a4072c4e21807a804f4edfc81d8dcc15ff4e

After you've purchased your ticket, please make sure you include a comment in your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Details to be sent to "YES" RSVPs
item.name: "Dance for a Cure" Gala - Dancing with the Stars Cast! Prostate Cancer Benefit
